member.name: T:AttributeHelpers.AttributeHelpers.ModuleAttribute
member.summary: This attribute is used to adjust the runtime representation for a module. Note: this may affect how a module is compiled.

member.name: T:AttributeHelpers.AttributeHelpers.QualifiedAttribute
member.summary: This attribute is used to indicate that references to the elements of a module, record, or union type require explicit qualified access.

member.name: P:AttributeHelpers.AttributeHelpers.Suffix
member.summary: This value may be combined with the `ModuleAttribute` to have the compiler append the word "Module" to the end of a type. Use with caution.
